submitAidDescription: Submit your aid request and our AI system will categorize and prioritize it to connect you with the right resources quickly.

steps.submitDesc: Provide your location and describe what aid you need
steps.aiDesc: Our system automatically categorizes and prioritizes your request
steps.connectDesc: Local responders and aid providers will see your request and respond

name: Your Name (Optional)
requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
successSubmitted: Success! Your request has been submitted successfully.

placeholders.name: Enter your name
placeholders.location: Enter your location (e.g., 123 Main St, City, State)
placeholders.requestDetails: Describe what kind of aid you need (food, water, medical supplies, shelter, etc.)...

hints.location: Provide as specific a location as possible for faster response
hints.requestDetails: Be as specific as possible. Include quantities, urgency level, and any special requirements.

emergency.title: Emergency Notice:
emergency.text: If this is a life-threatening emergency, please call 911 immediately. This system is for non-emergency aid coordination.

noRequests: No aid requests have been submitted yet.
noRequestsFilter: No requests found matching the current filters.
dashboardDescription: View and respond to aid requests in your area
confirmClearDatabase: Clear all requests from database? This cannot be undone.
forRespondersText: To respond to a request, contact the requester directly using the provided information. For coordination with other responders, use your organization's standard communication channels.
errorLoadDB: Failed to load requests from database. Use 'Add Sample Data' to populate with test data.
